participant_1.background:
I am short, but I am still able to do my work on the farm.
i have purple hair.
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.
I play my music in the back of my big truck and enjoy the freedom of the road.
I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others.

participant_2.background:
I love finding little things in the woods to add to my collection.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
i have never traveled out of the country.
i work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing?
I am doing pretty good, I am a little tired from work but otherwise I am good.
I can understand that, I work on a farm so I am always on my feet.
That sounds like a lot of work, but I bet it is rewarding.
It is, I love being outside and working with my hands.
That is great, I wish I could get more time to spend outside.
I have purple hair, what do you think of it?
I love it, it is so unique and different.
Thanks, I like it too.
What is your favorite thing to do on your days off?
I like to relax and go for walks in the woods.
That sounds really peaceful, I could use some of that in my life.
I have a lot of fun finding little things in the woods to add to my collection.
That sounds like a really neat hobby, I love collecting things too.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.
That is so cool, I have never tried to make my own clothes before.
It is not too hard, and it is really rewarding to see something you made come together.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should, it is a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion, I think I will.
You are welcome, I hope you have a great day.
You too, thanks for chatting with me.
